title: The Consulting Crusader: The Adventures of Walter Green

story.text: Walter Green starts his week with an unusual call. One of his regular clients claims to have seen mysterious lights hovering over the city park. Walter, being a part-time counselor and also a superhero in disguise, decides to investigate after sundown.
Upon reaching the park, Walter discovers a hidden alien artifact. This discovery could explain the strange phenomena around the city. He spends the day analyzing it in his hidden lab.

Walter uses his counseling skills to subtly question locals about recent strange occurrences, without raising suspicion. He pieces together that the artifact is causing emotional distress among the citizens.

Using his consulting expertise, Walter devises a plan to neutralize the artifact's effects. He collaborates with local scientists under the guise of offering corporate consulting for stress management.

With the help of his allies, Walter successfully creates a device that counters the alien technology, restoring peace and balance to the community’s emotions. He returns the artifact to a secure facility he consults for, which deals with extraterrestrial objects.

Walter hosts a free community counseling session, helping those affected by the week's events to cope with their experiences. His dual talents provide unique insights, making the session incredibly effective.

Reflecting on the week, Walter realizes the importance of his dual life in maintaining not just order, but also supporting mental health. He commits to further refine his skills in both domains, ready for whatever challenge comes next.

ending: As the week closes, Walter understands that every aspect of his life is crucial in his quest to protect and serve.
moral: Combining one’s passions and talents can create extraordinary results, both in everyday life and in extraordinary circumstances.
